snippet: For more than 100 years, women have waited for a portrait of someone of their sex at the center of a paper note. Their wait may have just gotten longer.
abstract: Treasury Sec Jacob Lew is considering retaining portrait of Alexander Hamilton on front of $10 bill due to enormous success of Broadway musical Hamilton; Lew had announced that woman would be featured on new $10 bill, but now vignette of female historical figures is likely to appear on flip side of bill; Lew is expected to announce woman will appear on $20 and $5 bills instead.
lead_paragraph: For more than 100 years, women have waited for a portrait of someone of their sex at the center of a paper note. Their wait may have just gotten longer.

headline.main: Success of ‘Hamilton’ May Have Saved Hamilton on the $10 Bill
headline.print_headline: Broadway Success of ‘Hamilton’ May Have Saved Hamilton on the $10 Bill
